keyMoments.title: Rescue of Kin'emon
keyMoments.description: Zoro, Sanji, and Brook work together to rescue the samurai Kin'emon from freezing water.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's compassion for strangers in need.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Operation Begins
keyMoments.description: Luffy, Franky, and Robin arrive at Caesar's laboratory to begin the kidnapping operation as part of their alliance with Law.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the crew's active participation in the Pirate Alliance's plan.

keyMoments.title: Stealth Infiltration
keyMoments.description: Law leads a covert approach to Caesar's laboratory with Chopper, demonstrating tactical planning.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's strategic leadership style as alliance co-leader.

keyMoments.title: Assault on Caesar's Laboratory
keyMoments.description: Under Smoker's leadership, the G-5 Marines launch a frontal assault on Caesar's laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the G-5 Marines as a third force in the conflict alongside the pirates and Caesar's subordinates.

keyMoments.title: Surprise Encounter with Luffy
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines are shocked to encounter Luffy and the Straw Hats at Caesar's lab.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the complex three-way conflict.
